text: Mariano Wong (born 3 July 1997) is a Peruvian karateka. At the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru, he won one of the bronze medals in the men's kata event. In 2018, he won one of the bronze medals in the men's kata event at the 2018 South American Games held in Cochabamba, Bolivia. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable sortable" width=45% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Venue !!Rank!!Event |- |2018 |South American Games |Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |Individual kata |- |2019 |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |Individual kata |} == References == Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Peruvian male karateka Category:Pan American Games medalists in karate Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Peru Category:Karateka at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:South American Games medalists in karate Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Peru Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games
title: Mariano Wong
